information.title: Who am I?
information.text: My name is Adam Giesinger, I'm 15 years old and I live in the City of St. Gallen, Switzerland. Developing and engineering software is one of my biggest hobbies. I also really enjoy playing football with some friends and playing video games.

information.title: My experience
information.text: I've worked on many different projects, some of which you can check out on my GitHub profile. At the moment I am a trainee at Namics. I can contribute to many different projects there. I have the opportunity to create iOS apps, Drupal websites, Sitecore applications and many more things at Namics.
